## Describe when the error happens
I get the error when I run the command ;updatestats

## Steps to reproduce
1. Set [Stats] -> enable to true
2. Set [Stats] -> tusersid to "Users in server"
3. Start the server
4. Run the command ;updatestats
5. See error in log
